specialAbilities.Hold Breath: While out of water, the octopus can hold its breath for 1 hour.
specialAbilities.Underwater Camouflage: The octopus has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made while underwater.
specialAbilities.Water Breathing: The octopus can breathe only underwater.

Tentacles.onHit: (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target

Ink Cloud.desc: (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest) A 20-foot-radius cloud of ink extends all around the octopus if it is underwater. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash action as a bonus action.
